QuestData.Title: Ancient Relics
QuestData.Description: Welcome to the peaks.$B$BI have a simple request before you head off on whatever grand jaunt you have planned. There are relics and treasures of ancient Ulduar scattered through these mountains. Most are likely in possession of the various sentient races.$B$BReturn any that you find to me, and I will reward you in kind. Perhaps I'll even let you partake on my many potent ales.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return 10 Relics of Ulduar to Olut Alegut at the Grom'arsh Crash-site.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find the relics of which I spoke?
QuestData.RewardText: These will do nicely! I am much obliged. Perhaps a drink for your troubles?
